abstractText: Unfortunately, some of the corrections are not updated in the original article. The corrections are given below: In page 4, third paragraph, the authors of Emma Hilton (2017) is changed to the authors of Ortega-Baron et al. (2022). And the below reference is added. J. Ortega-Baron, J.M. Machimbarrena, I. Montiel, and J. Gonz ́alez-Cabrera. Viral internet challenges scale in preadolescents: An exploratory study. Current Psychology, pages 1–11, 2022. Correction to: Extracting time patterns from the lifespans of TikTok challenges to characterize non‑dangerous and dangerous ones
Gianluca Bonifazi1 · Silvia Cecchini1 · Enrico Corradini1 · Lorenzo Giuliani1 · Domenico Ursino1  · Luca Virgili1

sections.heading: Social Network Analysis and Mining (2022) 12:62
sections.text:
https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s13278- 022- 00893-w
Unfortunately, some of the corrections are not updated in the original article. The corrections are given below:
In page 4, third paragraph, the authors of Emma Hilton (2017) is changed to the authors of Ortega-Baron et al. (2022).
And the below reference is added. J. Ortega-Baron, J.M. Machimbarrena, I. Montiel, and
J. Gonz´alez-Cabrera. Viral internet challenges scale in preadolescents: An exploratory study. Current Psychology, pages 1–11, 2022.
